plot: A troubled teenage girl, whose father is a drunk and brokenhearted man, is driven slowly mad with fear during a thunderstorm.
title: Paranoid Instability
plot_es: A troubled teenage girl, whose father is a drunk and brokenhearted man, is driven slowly mad with fear during a thunderstorm.
plot_en: A troubled teenage girl, whose father is a drunk and brokenhearted man, is driven slowly mad with fear during a thunderstorm.
